biotools.summary: Minicule provides researchers with a streamlined way to explore and organize biomedical knowledge by using knowledge graphs and dendrograms to map connections between concepts and findings. It connects directly to trusted data sources like PubMed, OpenAlex, and the USPTO, giving users immediate access to high-quality, up-to-date scientific publications and patent records. This approach helps researchers trace relationships, discover patterns, and verify evidence efficiently, supporting better-informed decisions without adding unnecessary technical complexity.
